name: Unstable Business
description:
Story

In this game you play as Peter.

Peter's running an unstable business. You want to know why? Peter sells pizza's, but his customers only order from him because they think he is the coolest delivery driver in the world.

But Peter still needs to earn enough money to keep his business afloat. No money means game over!

Make money by delivering all your customers their pizza. You do this by pressing [Enter] or [Controller A] when you get near their house.

In order to get more clients you have to perform stunts. So pop a wheelie or do a backflip to get more customers!

Good luck!

Controls Keyboard

Movement - WASD

Deliver Pizza - Enter

Controller

Forward/Backward - Right trigger/Left trigger

Lean Left/Right - Left analog stick
